Students are expected to fully prepare for each session through completion of reading assignments, cases, participation of discussion topics, and peer learning experiences as instructed via LUNA and/or in-class announcements.
There will be a mix of theory and practice through utilizing real-work examples. Students are expected to demonstrate one’s findings through interactive class participation, work with peers, and assignments. Therefore, it is strongly suggested for the student to have completed Marketing Management and Marketing Communication before taking this course.
